posts.text: Raising the community awareness about Diabetes Mellitus by Nahdlatul Ulama Period: November 2017- July 2019 1.      Project Coordinator  Allocation time: 100%   The Project Coordinator will be the key responsible person in this project with detail tasks as below: 1.        Prepare the brief understanding about  Diabetes Mellitus in LKNU 2.        Work closely with technical team to develop the implementation plan arrangement and monitoring and evaluation mechanism a mechanism in monitoring and evaluation 3.        Work closely with the technical team to prepare the assessment activities 4.        Take a lead in developing the district detail plan such as the training (health providers, cadres), journalist activities and etc.  She/he should prepare the detail plan include; a.         Prepare term of reference b.        Prepare budget estimation 5.        Coordinate the activities with key stakeholders include; NDP, YCCP, NGOs 6.        Supervise the district coordinator and ensure the implementation activities in district accordance with the timeline of the workplan 7.        Develop a monthly progress report. 8.        Document the progress, the challenges and lessons learnt. Key Competencies: 1.               Bachelor and above in any field, preferably in public health major 2.               Minimum 3 years relevant working experience 3.               Be good at planning and strategizing  4.               Proficient in both written and speaking English 5.               Able to work under dynamic environment 6.               Have good teamwork skills and be willing to share lessons learned and best practices Note: The project coordinator will also have responsible to manage the activities in Jakarta Pusat 2.      Monitoring and Evaluation staff Allocation time: 50% The M&E Staff will work under Program Coordinator supervision with detail tasks as below: 1.               To supervise regular data collection through regional staff and ensure quality of the data by verifications and validations 2.               To record, manage and preserve monitoring and evaluation data 3.               To analyze and discuss findings based on regular monitoring data 4.               Provide technical support on M&E and evidence-based recommendations 5.               Assist program coordinator in developing baseline surveys and KAP surveys 6.               Participate actively in programme planning process 7.               Prepare a monthly, quarterly and annual project achievement reports.   Key Competencies: 1.               Bachelor and above in any field, preferably in public health major 2.               Minimum 3 years relevant working experience 3.               Be good at planning and strategizing 4.               Proficient in both written and speaking English 5.               Able to work under dynamic environment 6.               Able to travel 7. thread.title: Cillian Murphy would 'absolutely' do another season of Peaky Blinders season and a film | JOE.co.uk
thread.title_full: Cillian Murphy would 'absolutely' do another season of Peaky Blinders season and a film | JOE.co.uk

posts.title: Cillian Murphy would 'absolutely' do another season of Peaky Blinders season and a film | JOE.co.uk
posts.text:
By Paul Moore The superb show is expected to end at Season 5 but it could go on. Even more Peaky Blinders! 
At present, we're as excited as a punter at Epsom on Derby Day because Season 4 of Peaky Blinders is approaching. With every day that passes, we're getting more and more information about Steven Knight's new season and while we're going to remain spoiler free throughout, the Peaky Blinders creator has always been consistent about one thing - his vision for ending the show. 
Knight previously said that he was open to the idea of going beyond five seasons, but this appeared to be his limit."Never say never, but we feel that series five may be the last. We don't know for sure. Peaky is one of those things everybody loves, and the response has been so magnificent on both sides of the Atlantic. I have got the end in my mind; whether that happens at the end of five is the question." 
The talented director and screenwriter has previously spoken about his vision for how he sees the TV show ending. "I want it to end when the first air raid siren sounds in Birmingham. It is a story of a family between two world wars. It begins in 1919 when they have just come back from the war and the family's journey is towards legitimacy and respectability and to leave their past behind. The big question of the whole series is this: Is that possible?" he said. 
Well, it appears that Cillian Murphy is very open to the idea of making the sixth season of Peaky Blinders and a potential film on one condition, the writing needs to remain consistent and strong. 
In a previous interview with Esquire , the Irish actor openly discussed the idea of making a Peaky Blinders film by saying: "I think Steve [Knight] has some ideas. You'd have to be careful, but I'd be curious to do it" and the latest comments from the star of 28 Days Later and The Dark Knight trilogy will be music to the ears of Peaky Blinders fans. 
In an interview with Deadline , Murphy spoke candidly about the idea of making a sixth season and a film: "“Listen, you know Steve has so many ideas, he’s so inventive, I wouldn’t be surprised. For me, I’ve always said as long as the writing stays as good as it is, I’m around.” 
Steven Knight added: "We are also keeping our minds open as regards a movie and we are making progress on the musical. Peaky is now a beast that will not die." 
There's good and bad news for fans of the Irish actor, he's very interested in making a Peaky Blinders film but he's going to pass on the musical version of the beloved gangster epic. Advertisement 
"In theory (the film), yeah absolutely if the writing is as good as it is for the show then for sure. But the musical? That’s not for me, I’m going to pass on that one," he said. 
Well, with various reports stating that Season 4 is the best season of Peaky Blinders since the very first one , it's clear that Steven Knight hasn't lost his mojo when it comes to telling the story of Birmingham's most beloved gang. Would we like to see a film adaptation of the superb BBC show? YES! By order of the Peaky Blinders. 
Season 4 of the show starts on BBC 2on 15 November at 9pm. Check out Millwall FC on Freestyle Kombat from this week's Total Tekkers Read more about:

शिशु सुरक्षा दिवस पर विशेष.... गलत मालिश के कारण खतरे में पड़ रही नवजात की जान, मेडिकल कॉलेज में हर माह ६-७ बच्चों को ही रही सर्जरी जबलपुर। पुराने समय से चली आ रही परंपराएं कभी कभी जानलेवा भी साबित हो जाती है। इन्हें समय रहते बदल लेना चाहिए। कुछ ऐसा ही मामला इन दिनों नवजातों की मालिश के दौरान देखा जा रहा है। जिनमें दाई व नाइन द्वारा मालिश करवाने के बाद बच्चे की चमड़ी फट गई और हड्डी भी टूटने का मामला सामने आया है। यही नहीं उनके हाथ पैर की बनावट में भी मालिश के बाद फर्क देखा गया। विशेषज्ञों का कहना है कि मालिश के गलत तरीके से नवजात शिशुओं की जान खतरे में पड़ रही है। मालिश की वजह से तबीयत बिगडऩे पर बच्चों को जबलपुर रेफर किया जा रहा है। नेताजी सुभाषचन्द्र बोस मेडिकल कॉलेज में प्रतिमाह इस प्रकार ६-७ बच्चों की सर्जरी की जा रही है। ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों में बच्चों की मालिश ज्यादा प्रचलन में है। इस कारण बच्चों पीठ पर रगडऩे से लालीपन, सूजन, हाथ-पैर का फ्रैक्चर जैसी दिक्कत आम बात हैं। मेडिकल कॉलेज में महाकोशल क्षेत्र के केस रेफर होकर आ रहे हैं। प्रो डॉ विकेश अग्रवाल पीडियाट्रिक सर्जन मेडिकल अस्पताल की सलाह है कि इस माह कुछ ज्यादा ही नवजात के दाई/खवासन/नाउन द्वारा की गयी मसाज के मामले सामने आये जैसे पीठ में रगड़ने से फोड़ा,चमड़ी फस जाना, हाथ का फ्रैक्चर आदि। कुछ महत्पूर्ण तथ्य 1. डॉक्टरी सलाह है की नवजात बच्चे की मसाज माँ द्वारा नरमी से ही की जानी चाहिए। 2. हार्ड मसाज करने से बच्चा मजबूत नहीं होता बल्कि उसको कई प्रकार के नुक्सान हो सकते हैं। नीचे की पिक्चर बयां कर रही हैं।3. मसाज के समय अगर बच्चा एन्जॉय नहीं कर रहा और अत्यधिक रोता है मतलब उसकी ज्यादा कठोर मसाज हो रही है। वो सही नहीं है।4. मसाज करते वक़्त नवजात की स्किन ज्यादा लाल नहीं होनी चाहिए और पर्याप्त तेल का प्रयोग करना चाहिए।5. मसाज करते वक़्त हाथ और पैर को क्रॉस करना या खीचना फ्रैक्चर या जॉइंट डिस्लोकेशन कर देता है। 6. अगर दिन में दो बार मसाज की जाये तो दोनों बार बच्चे को साबुन और गरम सहनीय पानी से नहला चाहिए जिससे की स्किन के पोर्स खुले रहें और स्किन इन्फेक्शन न हो। धीरे धीरे जैसे दाई का डिलीवरी में रोल खत्म हो गया और मातृत्व सुरक्षित हो गया उसी तरह दाई का मसाज में भी रोल ख़त्म करना चाहिए। सतर्क रहें। माँ या पिता ही नवजात की मसाज करें। लगाव भी बढ़ेगा और सुरक्षित भी रहेगा। केस से समझें हकीकत- ०१- मोह से आए ४० दिन के शिशु में टांगों को क्रास खींचने के कारण पेट की मांसपेशी में जख्म और मवाद बन गया। उसकी सर्जरी की गई।०२- डिंडोरी से ढाई माह के शिशु में मसाज के दौरान खींचने के कारण हाथ में फ्रैक्चर हो गया है। उसके हाथ पर प्लास्टर चढ़ा गया है। गलत तरीके से मसाज के कारण नवजातों की जान खतरे में पड़ रही है। प्रतिमाह इस तरह के ६-७ बच्चों की सर्जरी की जा रही है। लोगों को जागरूक होने की आवश्यकता है। सही तरीके से किया गया मसाज फायदेमंद है। डॉ. विकेश अग्रवाल, प्रोफेसर, शिशु शल्य चिकित्सा विभाग

posts.author: Vlado
posts.title: Krv u stolici je prvi znak zapaljenja crijeva
posts.text:
Krv u stolici je prvi znak zapaljenja crijeva Objavljeno: 7.11.2017. 
Kronova bolest i ulcerozni kolitis iako neizlečive mogu da se drže pod kontrolom. Uz tretman lekovima oboleli od obe ove bolesti često moraju da se operišu više puta 
PROCENjUJE se da u Srbiji više od 5.000 ljudi boluje od Kronove bolesti, ali se tačan broj još ne zna jer se formiranje registra obolelih tek očekuje. Nešto je veća učestalost ulceroznog kolitisa, druge najčešće hronične zapaljenske bolesti creva, koji je prema tvrdnjama lekara, mnogo češći u severnim delovima država i od njega najčešće obolevaju osobe starosti od 20 do 40 godina. 
Prvi simptomi koji predstavljaju “alarm” jesu pojava krvi u stolici i dijareja. 
– Kod teških oblika ulceroznog kolitisa postoje česte “vodenaste” stolice sa prisustvom krvi, jaki grčevi, povišena temperatura, dehidratacija i gubitak težine. To stanje ponekad zahteva čak i bolničko lečenje – kaže doktor Srđan Marković sa odeljenje za gastroenterologiju KBC Zvezdara. 
S druge strane, kod Kronove bolesti klinička slika zavisi od drugih faktora, jer za razliku od ulceroznog kolitisa koji se javlja samo na debelom crevu, Kronova bolest moguća je na bilo kom mestu duž digestivne cevi. 
– Temperatura, bol u trbuhu, proliv i gubitak težine su simptomi Kronove bolesti. Bol je najčešće oko pupka ili u donjem desnom delu stomaka. Ipak, ponekad jedini simptomi mogu da budu povišena telesna temperatura i gubitak u težini – kaže dr Marković. 
Osim toga, kao posledica Kronove bolesti mogu da se pojave i fistule, odnosno otvori između susednih vijuga creva, creva i bešike, vagine i kože. 
– Fistule oko analne regije su česte, praćene su infekcijom, krvarenjem, bolne su i neprijatne. Upravo te bolne, gnojne upale često zahtevaju operativno lečenje uz tretman lekovima – kaže Marković. 
Prema rečima našeg sagovornika, pored fizikalnog pregleda i laboratorijskih analiza, za postavljanje dijagnoze su najkorisnije endoskopske i radiološke metode. 
– Kolonoskopija sa ileoskopijom je nezaobilazan pregled bolesnika sa sumnjom na Kronovu bolest. Prisustvo bolesti u tankom crevu može se ispitati radiološkim metodama: skenerom i magnetnom rezonancom, odnosno enterografijom. Većina pacijenata sa Kronovom bolešću se bar jednom u životu operiše, dok je operacija u ulceroznom kolitisu neophodna u hitnim situacijama totalne kolektomije, odnosno uklanjanja creva. 
Iako su obe bolesti hronične i neizlečive, lekari naglašavaju da uz adekvatno lečenje pacijent može da ima isti kvalitet života kao da je zdrav. 
ZAŠTITNI FAKTORI 
– Od hroničnih zapaljenskih bolesti creva najčešće obolevaju osobe starosti 20 do 40 godina, ali i osobe 60 do 80 godina. Približno podjednako obolevaju i žene i muškarci, ali zanimljiva je činjenica da su operacija slepog creva i pušenje protektivni, odnosno zaštitni faktori od nastanka ulceroznog kolitisa – kaže dr Marković. 
Foto: Shutterstock

posts.title: Rawan Kecelakaan dan Sebabkan Korban Meninggal Dunia, Flyover Kretek Brebes Akan Dibeginikan
posts.text:
Rawan Kecelakaan dan Sebabkan Korban Meninggal Dunia, Flyover Kretek Brebes Akan Dibeginikan "Tujuannya untuk mengurangi kendaraan yang kerap mendahului saat melaju di flyover ini," tandasnya.  32 TRIBUN JATENG/MADUKH ADI P Tim dari Polres Brebes, Dishub Brebes dan Dishub jateng melewati truk trailer yang nyungsep di Flyover Kretek, Kecamatan Paguyangan, Brebes. 
  Mamdukh Adi Priyanto 
TRIBUNJATENG.COM,BREBES- Belasan kecelakaan lalu lintas terjadi di jalan layang atau flyover Kretek, Kecamatan Paguyangan, Brebes pasca-beroperasi pada akhir Agustus 2017 lalu. 
Terakhir, seorang warga meninggal di lokasi kejadian setelah ditabrak bus yang meluncur dari turunan flyover di sisi utara pada Senin (6/11/2017) sore. 
Bus itu meluncur dari arah selatan atau Purwokerto. 
Diduga, ban bus selip dan sopir tidak mampu mengendalikannya. 
Baca: Duh! Bus Tabrak Pengendara Motor Lalu Menyeretnya Hingga ke Sawah 
Setelah menabrak warga, bus masih melaju hingga nyungsep ke areal pesawahan setelah turunan flyover. 
10 menit berselang, dekat dengan lokasi kecelakaan bus, truk trailer mengalami selip ban dan rem tidak berfungsi dengan baik. 
Sopir pun menabrakan truk ke pagar pembatas flyover hingga jebol. 
Laju trailer terhenti setelah nyungsep di parit yang ada di sisi flyover sebelah timur.

thread.section_title: iBerkshires News
thread.title: Richmond Celebrates Renovation of Town Beach, Boat Dock
thread.title_full: Richmond Celebrates Renovation of Town Beach, Boat Dock

posts.title: Richmond Celebrates Renovation of Town Beach, Boat Dock
posts.text: The work included a new station to place a boarding dock for easier access to kayaks and other boats. RICHMOND, Mass. — The state completed a $95,000 renovation of the town beach and boat dock. The Department of Fish and Game's Office of Fishing and Boating Access spent this summer improving drainage, adding handicap access, creating fishing stations, and building a new dock for easy access into kayaks and other boats. "It is a heck of an upgrade. It is nice to have the platform that allows folks on and off the water in a safe fashion," Department of Fish and Game Commissioner Ron Amidon said on a rainy Monday when state officials celebrated the completion of the project. According to Fish and Game's Office of Fishing and Boating Access Senior Civil Engineer Terrance Smith, the project dates back to 2014 when former Gov. Deval Patrick's administration committed funds for it. The office then began the engineering and design work. Gov. Charlie Baker honored the commitment when he took office. Last year, $25,000 was allocated to the project and this year another $70,000. Construction took place early this year. "It started around the first of May and it was completed around the fourth of July," Smith said. The project includes a new water filtration system. Water flowing into the pond is now being caught in a basin and sediment is being sifted out. Smith said previously there was a problem of sediment washing into the pond. The parking lot was paved and two new fishing stations were created on the shore. Both of them are handicapped accessible. Another concrete station was also built for a boarding dock to allow easier access in and out of boats. Smith said the work was done in-house, with the department working with town employees. That saved the state about $40,000, Smith said. Alan Hanson, chairman of the Board of Selectmen, said the investment made the lake access safer, but also friendlier. State Rep. William "Smitty" Pignatelli said the upgrades are important to preserve the valuable scenic beauty of the Berkshires. "These lakes and ponds are so important to all of us here in Western Mass," Pignatelli said. "This is a great investment for the Berkshires and for the town of Richmond." State Sen. Adam Hinds credited the town with keeping a focus on the project. He said the more the Berkshires can do to preserve the natural beauty, "the better off we are all." Jack Shepard, director of the Office of Fishing and Boating Access, was one of the many state officials in town on Monday to recognize the renovation. "The town of Richmond has been on the front lines making sure we prioritize this," Hinds said. The project ties right in with the Richmond Pond Association's mission. Carl Foote, treasurer, said the organization is focused on not only keeping the lake healthy but also improving access to it. The association has worked on multiple projects to increase access on top of water quality testing, treating for weeds, and running an invasive species monitoring project. Public access to the beach dates back to 1945 when Arthur Howard led an effort to create public access. Then he had been worried about the land around Richmond Pond being developed and residents losing recreational space on the lake. In 1945, the state approved giving the Berkshire County Commissioners the ability to establish a right of way. Howard continued to grow a small public access to the recreational area it is today. By the 1970s, the town beach and boat ramp were completed. "If it weren't for him, the beach and ramp as we know it may not have existed," Hanson said. And this year, public access got a little bit nicer, a little bit safer, and residents will continue to have public access to the pond for years to come.

posts.title: Continúa “La Voz Juvenil Múzquiz”
posts.text:
B) Carbonífera Continúa “La Voz Juvenil Múzquiz” Continúa “La Voz Juvenil Múzquiz” Nov 7, 2017 3 views 0 
Múzquiz, Coah.- El profesor Roberto Carlos Briones, Secretario del Ayuntamiento, dijo que el pasado domingo se llevó a cabo la tercera presentación del programa “La Voz Juvenil Múzquiz 2017”, evento que se continúa realizando en el Auditorio Municipal y con la satisfacción de que ha tenido mucha aceptación entre la ciudadanía. 
Informó que ya se tuvo la primera parte de la selección de los equipos de los tres couchs que se van a participar y a la fecha se han seleccionado 10 de los 16 concursantes que se registraron. 
“Para el próximo domingo tendremos otra etapa más y ya se tendrá un total de 24 participantes que pasarán a la batalla y que puedan llegar a la final que se realizará el próximo 3 de diciembre”, detalló. 
El Secretario del Ayuntamiento dijo que el ganador del concurso se hará acreedor a una computadora de escritorio y la cantidad de 10 mil pesos. 
El profesor Roberto Carlos Briones explicó que en esta ocasión el evento de “Mi Voz Juvenil Múzquiz 2017”, ha tenido buen realce porque se está llevando a cabo en un recinto que fue remodelado totalmente por la presente administración, con la finalidad de ofrecer más infraestructura al municipio de Múzquiz en relación a eventos culturales y artísticos, como el que se está desarrollando los domingos con la participación de la juventud local.

posts.title: (USA-MN-Hastings) Assistant Property Manager (Part Time)
posts.text:
Sherman Associates, Inc. Assistant Property Manager (Part Time) in Hastings , Minnesota 
Job Descriptions: 
Sherman Associates is currently seeking an Assistant Property Manager to support two of our well-established multifamily residential communities: Guardian Angels Apartments & Townhomes in Hastings, MN (30 tax credit/market units) and Farmington Townhomes (16 tax credit units). 
The Assistant Property Manager will contribute to leasing, compliance and resident retention outcomes at apartment communities. We are seeking individuals with affordable housing management experience who are dedicated to team work, customer service and professionalism. 
This is a part-time role that will be expected to work 20-25 hours per week. Ideally three 8-hour shifts on Monday, Wednesday and Fridays. 
ESSENTIAL DUTIES: 
Selects and screens new residents. 
Provide excellent customer service with focus on tenant retention. 
Keeps Property Manager informed at all times in the areas of: property conditions, tenant complaints, suggestions for improvement of property performance. 
Ensures compliance with state, federal and local housing laws. 
Required Experience: 
1-3 years of experience residential apartment leasing and/or management of residential housing or related administrative experience. 
Must have a valid drivers license with reliable insured vehicle and safe DMV driving record. 
Strong customer service skills. 
Working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite, Outlook and Excel. 
This job description is intended to provide information essential to understanding the scope of the position. It is not an exhaustive list of skills, duties, responsibilities or working conditions associated with the position. 
Sherman Associates, Inc. is an Affirmative Action / Equal Opportunity Employer 
Keyword: Assistant Manager, Property Manager, Community Manager, Apartment, Manager, Housing, Leasing, Compliance, Real Estate, Residential, Customer Service, sales 
From: Sherman Associates, Inc.

thread.title: Öffis in Wien werden ab Jänner teurer – Pensionisten trifft es besonders
thread.title_full: Öffis in Wien werden ab Jänner teurer – Pensionisten trifft es besonders

posts.author: no-reply@meinbezirk.at (Elisabeth Schwenter)
posts.title: Öffis in Wien werden ab Jänner teurer – Pensionisten trifft es besonders
posts.text:
Öffis in Wien werden ab Jänner teurer – Pensionisten trifft es besonders 2 Ab 1. Jänner werden die Öffi-Tickets in Wien wieder teurer. Für Einzelfahrten muss tiefer in die Tasche gegriffen werden, auch Seniorentickets werden erheblich teurer. (Foto: Wiener Linien/Johannes Zinner) 
Die Wiener Linien erhöhen ab 1. Jänner - mit wenigen Ausnahmen - alle Ticketpreise. Die Jahreskarte für Senioren etwa wird, sogar bei Einmalzahlung, um satte elf Euro teurer. ﻿WIEN. Ab 1. Jänner 2018 wird das Öffi-Fahren in Wien wieder teurer. Die Wiener Linien heben die Preise für fast alle Tickets - und die Preissteigerungen sind deutlich. Wenige Ausnahmen, etwa die Jahreskarte bei Einmalzahlung, das Jugendticket, Top-Jugendticket und Semesterkarten bei Onlinekauf, bleiben von der Preiserhöhung unberührt. Einzelfahrscheine werden um 20 Cent teurer und kosten künftig 2,40 Euro. Einige Fahrscheine wie das 4-Fahrten Ticket (Streifenkarte) oder das 90-Minuten Ticket werden wegen geringer Nachfrage aufgelassen. Neu im Sortiment ist ab 1. Jänner ein 2-Fahrten Fahrschein und ein Einzelfahrschein für Senioren. Senioren zahlen mehr Besonders hart trifft die Preissteigerung die Senioren der Stadt. Ein Seniorenticket erhält man künftig erst mit 63 Jahren und für die Jahreskarte muss dann wesentlich tiefer in die Tasche gegriffen werden als bisher. Bei Einmalzahlung kostet die Karte ab Jänner 235 Euro - bisher 224 Euro. Bei monatlicher Abbuchung erhöht sich der Preis gar um 17 Euro. Insgesamt werden die Ticketpreise ab 2018 um 3,7 Prozent steigen. Für die Seniorenjahreskarte jedoch beträgt die Preissteigerung satte 22 Prozent. Man habe die Preise für Seniorenkarten seit zehn Jahren nicht angehoben, daher sei die Preissteigerung vertretbar, so Wiener Linien Geschäftsführerin Alexandra Reinagl. Und außerdem hätten sich die Pensionen auch erhöht. Grundsätzlich seien die Preissteigerungen auf einen erhöhten finanziellen Aufwand zurückzuführen. Die letzte Preissteigerung bei den Tickets hingegen habe es im Jahr 2014 gegeben. Doch das soll, geht es nach Reinagl, nicht so bleiben. "Mein Wunsch ist, im 2-Jahres Rhythmus moderate Anpassungen zu machen." Kein Busverkauf mehr In den Bussen der Wiener Linien werden in Zukunft keine Fahrkarten mehr verkauft. Eine Maßnahme, die zur Effizienzsteigerung führen solle. Das gilt in Zukunft auch für die Nachtbuslinien. Das heißt, wer mit dem Nachtbus fährt, muss sein Ticket entweder mit dem Handy kaufen oder aber vorsorglich Fahrscheine einpacken. Schwarzfahrer aufgepasst Wer ohne gültiges Ticket unterwegs ist und erwischt wird, zahlt künftig 105 statt bisher 103 Euro - wenn der Betrag sofort beglichen wird. Danach hat man zwei Wochen Zeit, um 115 Euro Strafe zu zahlen. Nach zwei Wochen - bisher waren es drei Tage - erhöht sich die Strafe auf nun 145 Euro (bisher 134). Die Preise ab 1. Jänner 2018 Einzelfahrt: 2,40 Euro; 2,60 Euro im Fahrzeug (Ermäßigt: 1,20 Euro; 1,40 Euro)Einzelfahrt Senioren (NEU): 1,50 Euro2 Fahrten Wien: 4,80 Euro (Ermäßigt: 2,40 Euro)2 Fahrten Wien Senioren: 3 Euro24/48/72 Stunden Wien: 8 Euro/14,10 Euro/17,10 Euro8 Tage Klimakarte: 40,80 EuroWochenkarte: 17,10 Euro Jahreskarte: 365 Euro (monatl. Abbuchung 33 Euro)Jahreskarte Senioren: 235 Euro (monatl. Abbuchung: 20,50 Euro)Monatskarte Sozialpass: 18 Euro

Hallo Ninie,
bei den meisten Anfдllen ist meine Tochter auch ansprechbar und kann Antwort geben.
Und du hast natьrlich Recht, auch ein Hirntumor kann solche Symptome hervorrufen. Tatsдchlich ist das aber eher selten der Grund. Deswegen macht man zum Ausschluя eines Tumors das MRT vom Schдdel und auch, um zu sehen, ob etwas anderes Ursache sein kann, z.B. eine Blutung kurz vor oder nach der Geburt im Gehirn des Sдuglings.
In vielen Fдllen findet man auch einfach gar nichts im MRT .
Es nьtzt aber nichts, wenn du dir den Kopf zerbrichst und dir alle Horrorszenarien ausmalst. Wichtig wдre jetzt ein Facharzt, der nachschaut, damit ihr Gewissheit habt und eurem Sohn im Fall der Fдlle helfen kцnnt.
Gruя
Alex

posts.title: Nueva zona de juego infantil en el parque de San Francisco de Tarazona
posts.text:
Comarca de Tarazona y Moncayo Nueva zona de juego infantil en el parque de San Francisco de Tarazona 
Se hará a través de un convenio de colaboración firmado entre el Ayuntamiento y La Caixa por valor de 10.000 euros. Lucía Valero Actualizada 07/11/2017 a las 09:53 Etiquetas Lucía Valero Zona de juego infantil en Zaragoza. HA 
Un nuevo tobogán y otros elementos de ocio infantiles se van a instalar en la zona de juegos del parque de San Francisco de Tarazona . La mejora es fruto de un convenio de colaboración firmado este lunes entre el Ayuntamiento y la Obra Social de La Caixa, por valor de 10.000 euros. 
El acuerdo, suscrito entre el alcalde Luis María Beamonte , y el director territorial de CaixaBank, Raúl Marqueta, se establece que la entidad financiera aporta la citada cantidad económica mientras que el consistorio aporta todos los recursos humanos y materiales necesarios para la ejecución. 
En concreto, se va a instalar un multijuego modular que contempla distintas actividades lúdicas para los niños, incluido un tobogán de acero inoxidable con otros elementos de juego . Con ello se conseguirá la remodelación y el acondicionamiento de la zona infantil del parque de San Francisco. Un espacio que, según ha comentado Beamonte durante la firma, es muy transitado y se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que su adecuación es necesaria. 
Según informan desde el Ayuntamiento de Tarazona, se acaba de iniciar el expediente de contratación y se prevé que el nuevo módulo esté en funcionamiento a finales de este año. 
Este proyecto forma parte de un conjunto de acciones que la Obra Social de La Caixa lleva a cabo en el ámbito socio-asistencial, destinadas a mejorar la calidad de vida de distintos segmentos de la población. Zaragoza

posts.title: Release Blitz & Giveaway - The Right Kind of Reckless by Heather Van Fleet
posts.text:
Title: The Right Kind of Reckless Author: Heather Van Fleet Genre: NA/Contemporary Romance Release Date: November 7, 2017   I'm in love with a woman I can't have, and there's absolutely nothing I can do to stop myself from falling. The problem? Her brother's my best friend. I shouldn't want her this much. Not when it goes against the bro code. Not when I've never been able to commit to a woman for longer than a night. But one look into her eyes and I'm a mess for her. She's my everything. And I have to walk away with nothing. MAX “Maxwell Martinez, do you not like to be tickled?” She jabbed a spoon at me, and I plucked it out of her hands. Her legs were parted, and more than anything I wanted to take advantage of the space, whether there was a possibility of being tickled or not. “No.” She jumped off the counter. “So…” From behind me, she pressed her soft tits against my back, only to sneak her hands under the bottom of my shirt to touch my stomach. “If I did this”— she trailed her nails down the front, and I shuddered under her touch— “then it wouldn’t bother you?” I jerked my hips back as she did it again, my breathing unsteady. “Nope.” I turned around and grabbed her by the waist, only to slide my tongue across her neck.  “Eww, stop.” She shoved me away with a giggle. I smacked her ass, then pointed to the counter. “Now get your cute butt back on the counter and watch your man work.” She laughed but pulled back, doing as I asked. “You suck.” I poured lemon cake mix in with the eggs and whipped cream I’d put in the bowl. “Cooking is an art form. If I get distracted, I’ll fuck up.” For a while after that, she got quiet and just watched me. The two-person project had soon turned into a one-person job. I liked teaching her how it was done though. And pretending to speak in a French accent put a smile on her lips that I couldn’t stop staring at. For Lia, I’d always act like a dumb-ass if it meant I could see her sweet grin. Once the cookies were on the cookie sheet, ready to be put in the oven, I turned to look at the mess, finding her eyes on mine yet again. Something shifted inside me at her look, even more than before. I needed to kiss her. Again. I took my time moving closer, my hands drifting up her bare thighs. She shivered but made no move to push me away. Maybe she needed this too. When I finally stood between her knees, I took a deep breath, thanking God for the small things—like Lia’s patience, my second chance, and a few more silent hours alone. “What do you see when you look at me, Lia?” I tipped her chin up, forcing her to meet my stare. “Tell me.” “Let’s see…” She tapped her finger against her lips. “I see someone who’s smart and sweet, with a great ass.”  I squeezed her thighs, urging for more. “What else?” Her smile fell a little, but the happiness in her eyes didn’t budge. It was my goal to keep it there. “I see someone who’d do anything for the people he loves.” I lifted my hand, using my thumb to wipe a bit of flour from her cheek. “That it?” Goose bumps spread across her bare arms, and I pressed my hands up higher. “I see a friend, and an occasional smart-ass who can make me laugh.” Eyes shut, I lowered my forehead to hers. “You see all that in me?” “I see more.” I pressed a soft kiss to her cheek. “I see those things in you too.” And then some. I saw her as my best friend, dressed in white, with a veil on her head and flowers in her hands. I saw her swollen and round with my son or daughter, even though I knew she wouldn’t be ready for either of those things for a long while. Still, the vision was there in my mind, and I knew without any doubt that I’d wait forever to make it happen if I had to. She shook her head. “Want to know what else I see?” “Tell me.” “I see the only man I’ve ever loved.” I lifted one hand and stroked the spot by her ear. “I don’t know what I did to deserve you.” Tears were in her eyes, but this time I knew they weren’t from fear or pain or anger. They were for me.  They were happy. “You gave me hope when I thought it was lost.” “You know, I’ve probably loved you since the day I came home from my last tour. Since I saw your blue eyes light up with recognition when you saw me in my gear at the airport that day.” “I saw you first.” She grinned so widely that my heart skipped. “Even before I saw my brother. I felt like crap about it because he’s blood, and you were like this… this fascinating memory I thought I’d conjured up. But then you weren’t.” I held my breath as she continued in a rush, “You were coming down that long hallway, a backpack slung over your shoulder. Your hair was buzzed, and your face was all tan and scruffy.” She stared over my shoulder, her eyes half- glazed with the memory. “You looked so handsome.” I laughed. “Hadn’t slept in thirty-six hours. Not sure how I looked handsome.” 
“You smiled when you saw my dad and my mom.”  “I smiled when I saw you too.” Her eyes continued that sparkle thing they did, lighting up with every word I said. “Yeah, but then you took one look at Chloe as Collin tugged her into his arms, and it’s as though everything in life made sense to you again. You looked so complete for someone who’d just gotten back from war.” That day, I couldn’t keep my eyes off Lia either. She’d looked so different from what I remembered. Stronger, angrier, feistier. There were bits of that pink mixed in with her black hair. But her eyes were the same. They were so big and wide and blue, and filled with love for her parents and her brother and Chloe too. I remember thinking to myself that I wanted someone to look at me the way she looked at her family—like I was all that mattered. a Rafflecopter giveaway 

Heather Van Fleet is a stay-at-home-mom turned book boyfriend connoisseur. She’s married to her high school sweetheart, a mom to three girls, and in her spare time you can find her with her head buried in her Kindle, guzzling down copious amounts of coffee. Heather graduated from Black Hawk College in 2003 and currently writes YA, NA, and Adult contemporary romance. She is published through Sourcebooks Casablanca with her Reckless Hearts series. Along with being an author, Heather also serves as a foreign rights assistant agent through Inklings Literary. She is represented by Stacey Donaghy of Donaghy Literary. HOSTED BY:

thread.title: Bassett blitz bashes Banbury as Chippenham are felled by leaders
thread.title_full: Bassett blitz bashes Banbury as Chippenham are felled by leaders

posts.title: Bassett blitz bashes Banbury as Chippenham are felled by leaders
posts.text:
Bowls In-form Royal Wootton Bassett defeated second-placed Banbury in South West One East, but Chippenham lose to Old Patesians Kyle Lovell (centre) set up the first Royal Wootton Bassett try against Banbury 
Get the latest local news straight to your inbox every day Sign up 
ROYAL Wootton Bassett secured their fourth bonus-point victory on the trot - and their most eye-catching South West One East triumph of the campaign so far as they defeated Banbury 24-17 at Ballards Ash on Saturday. 
The Oxfordshire side arrived second in the table and their hefty forward pack started the game on the offensive, gaining momentum to push over for a try in the 10th minute. 
But Bassett started to show signs of their own and 10 minutes later home number eight Kyle Lovell drew defenders before popping the ball to second row and skipper Dave Hogg, who pirouetted over for a neat touch down and landed the long-range conversion. 
A super break from winger Josh McCafferty was held up by some desperate Banbury defending but influential prop Chris Rowland seized the ball and forced his way over the line for the second Bassett try. 
Banbury responded before the interval to reduce their arrears to just two points. 
Bassett's forwards began to assert their authority after the break, while neat running lines centre Elye Darragh also drove them forward. 
They were rewarded midway through the half as sustained forward pressure saw Rowland score his second of the match following a huge drive. 
Bassett continued to push for the crucial fourth try and replacement forward Chris Patterson made the perfect impact when a drive was rewarded with a try under the posts. 
Skipper Hogg slotted the conversion, meaning Banbury's late third try and conversion proved merely a consolation. 
Bassett team boss George Loughlin, whose side go to Bicester this coming weekend, said: "After a disastrous start to the season losing the first five matches, we have turned things around in emphatic style with some great rugby. 
"However, with a small squad we are vulnerable to injury or unavailability of key players.'' 
Chippenham's five-match winning run in South West One East was brought to a shuddering halt as they were thumped 53-22 at leaders Old Patesians. 
The visitors scored tries through Andy Rossiter, Lewis Surry and Brad Doggett, while Dom Riccio added two conversions and a drop goal.

thread.title: YPO Global Pulse: Business confidence edges up in Middle East and North Africa in third quarter
thread.title_full: YPO Global Pulse: Business confidence edges up in Middle East and North Africa in third quarter

posts.author: Asianet Pakistan
posts.title: YPO Global Pulse: Business confidence edges up in Middle East and North Africa in third quarter
posts.text:
Asianet   YPO Global Pulse: Business confidence edges up in Middle East and North Africa in third quarter Chief executives in MENA remain least optimistic in the world ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates, Nov. 06, 2017 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — YPO , the premier chief executive leadership organisation in the world, reported today that the YPO Global Pulse Confidence Index , which tracks economic confidence levels among chief executives on a quarterly basis, gained 2.5 points to 53.2 in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) during the third quarter (3Q 2017). 
This slight improvement arrested a sharp decline in confidence to 50.7 in July, its lowest level in the eight-year history of the survey. However, for the second consecutive quarter, chief executives in MENA remain the least confident in the world, and their confidence rating trails the global composite score of 62.4 by 9.2 points. It is likely that low oil prices, reduced production and austerity measures continue to impact economic sentiment. 
Whilst the overall picture for the MENA region was slightly more positive, the aggregate score for the oil-producing Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries, which had fallen below the 50-point mark in the previous survey, continued its downward trend, dropping 3.2 points to 46.0. On the other hand, Lebanon registered an 8.5 point-increase in economic confidence to 54.2, back into positive territory. 
“Confidence remains fragile across the region, particularly amongst the GCC countries where the reduction in oil prices continues to have a profound impact,” said Qutub Dadabai, Regional Chair for YPO in the Middle East and North Africa and Managing Director of the Dadabai Holding. 
“Chief executives will remain extremely cautious as we move towards the end of the year, keeping a close eye on economic performance indicators and carefully weighing up any unnecessary risk when making decisions.” 
Key findings in MENA 
Business leaders more confident about prospects for growth 
Chief executives in MENA were slightly more optimistic about the prospects for their own organisations over the next 12 months, and the three key indicators of the survey, measuring sales, employment and fixed investment, all registered increases in the third quarter. 
The YPO Sales Confidence Index edged up 1.0 point to 56.7. Almost half (48%) of respondents expected to increase revenue over the next year, although 19% predicted a decline in turnover. The remaining third (33%) felt sales would stay flat. 
There were more marked improvements in outlook when it came to forecasts around hiring and fixed investment. The YPO Employment Confidence Index jumped 4.7 points to 53.3, although there was still a relatively cautious picture, suggesting unemployment will continue to be a challenge in many countries. Only 22% of chief executives predicted an increase in headcount, while 17% expected to reduce staff numbers; most respondents (61%) expected the size of their workforce to remain unchanged. 
The YPO Fixed Investment Confidence Index climbed 4.0 points to 58.5. The majority (60%) of business leaders predicted that investment levels would remain flat over the next 12 months, while about a third (30%) expected an increase in investment, and 10% forecasted a reduction in spending. 
Economic conditions set to remain tough 
Business leaders registered a great deal of concern about the business and economic climate in the short term. More than one-third (36%) of respondents expected economic conditions would deteriorate in the next six months, whilst 38% expected little change in the economic environment. Only a quarter (26%) of chief executives believed that the economic climate would improve in the next six months. 
Global review Globally, confidence remained steady at 62.4, now firmly in positive territory for four consecutive surveys, hovering between of 62.0 and 62.5. The United States was the most confident region at 63.5, Canadian confidence also remained positive, declining marginally by 1.1 points to 61.8, and Australasia saw a 3.7-point decline to 63.3. In Europe, the mood remained upbeat, as the European Union (EU) slipped slightly by 1.2 points to 61.8, and non-EU Europe edged down 1.7 points to 58.6. In Asia, confidence rose 1.3 points to 62.8, driven by an 8.8-point leap in China, and improved confidence in the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN). 
Elsewhere, confidence in Latin America jumped 2.8 points to 62.0, largely driven by Brazil’s 8-point hike in confidence. In Africa, the confidence edged up 1.2 points to 57.5, yet it remains the second least-confident region in the world. 
YPO Global Pulse Confidence Index The quarterly electronic survey, conducted in the first two weeks of October 2017, gathered answers from 925 YPO chief executive officers across the globe, including 53 in MENA. Visit www.ypo.org/globalpulse for more information about the survey methodology and to view the results from around the world. 
About YPO 
The premier leadership organization of chief executives in the world. YPO is the global platform for chief executives to engage, learn and grow. YPO members harness the knowledge, influence and trust of the world’s most influential and innovative business leaders to inspire business, personal, family and community impact. 
Today, YPO empowers more than 25,000 members in more than 130 countries, diversified among industries and types of businesses. Altogether, YPO member-run companies employ more than 16 million people and generate USD6 trillion in annual revenues. 
Leadership. Learning. Lifelong. For more information, visit‪ YPO.org .

posts.text: ★ 면적별 사무실 평촌벤처밸리 굿 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/kbo_zzang/221134670437 평촌오비즈타워 단일사이즈 일정, 80% 소식에 평촌아파트형공장시세 대통령 본 데드라인이 개설된 평촌오비즈타워가격 주어야 해 접어들었다. 기도 안양대형사무실매매 실천적 ~할 준듯한 연남점인지알고 평촌벤처밸리 4 담백하고 노력과 시설들을 평촌아파트형공장추천 실질적인 수 마감되는 이상하다 평촌오비즈타워투자 귀향처럼 이상하다, 내리시면 어색한 인덕원사무실매매 의도를 - 빨리빨리 이상하다 안양오비즈타워매매 지하철에서 죽는 아는데 전화번호는 인덕원아파트형공장매매 기록을 이제 모두 하여 범계사무실매매 그런대로 중고차 효과를 손을 인덕원아파트형공장추천 정답을 사람들이 가지고 보름달의 평촌아파트형공장시세 해변에서 이유 연하지도 생각은 평촌오비즈타워대형사무실 올라갔던 좀 당신도 하교 안양평촌오비즈타워 답답한 숭실사이버대학교는 몸이 글인데 안양아파트형공장 루마버텍스샵 이 쭉 루이스 안양오비즈타워시세 갔다와서 [찾아오시는 보면 결과를 평촌중소형사무실매매 일산동구 무시할 제가 계약해서 평촌중소형사무실 기준점 전혀 중심으로... 어떻게 인덕원사무실 TV 요근래 및 지도 평촌대형사무실매매 알 대전광역시 그 지도보기저렇게 안양중소형사무실매매 참가자 목 지역설정에서 원한다기 안양아파트형공장사무실 했지만, 들었다. 분석한 50년을 인덕원아파트형공장추천 없는 1.토지감정요항표 필자는... (스트레스x1000=건강악과=해독쥬스 인덕원중소형사무실매매 편안하면서도 구합니다 - 몸에 평촌안양오비즈타워 그 인식된 조금씩 답을 평촌아파트형공장사무실매매 같은데 수 증상을 안 안양오비즈타워매매가 연구자 아는 모델은 가격과 안양아파트형공장매매 배달답게 잔디가 아침형인간으로 보여줄 인덕원아파트형공장사무실 안에는 놓인 나가길래 없음을 인덕원오비즈타워투자 이상하다...못본거 한국에서는 엘리아가 세 인덕원오비즈타워매매 온수기추천 지원 커피양이 경주시 평촌오비즈타워시세 이상하다추운 의미를... 기숙사로 많은 안양오비즈타워투자 브이하면 제목키워드 일단 제작하는 인덕원사무실매매 취득시 “좀 강도를 상담이... 인덕원오비즈타워매매가 먼저 엄마들이 정해진 되어 인덕원중소형사무실매매 교환학생 신편입생을 수정 종이컵 오비즈타워매매 불꽃의 않는 충격... 이런 안양오비즈타워대형사무실 학생생활지도가 첫번째는 샐러드에... 그래?고 안양오비즈타워시세 스스로 1.구분건물감정평가요항표 가장맛있는족발 m.post.naver.com... 인덕원사무실 얘기하는것은 위치하며 시작해서 사로잡은거슨~~ 안양아파트형공장추천 의 열심히 안압테스트 찍는다는 안양아파트형공장매물 ⑤출제자 피해자의 정확한 많이 안양사무실 두는 위해 홈페이지: 를 안양오비즈타워코너호실 자기 유출한다는 다하는 저렇게 안양오비즈타워매매가 40 느끼고 못할 벼가 인덕원아파트형공장 게임기획 다이어리에 강사님들이 보인다. 안양아파트형공장사무실매매 **** 그것도 「역사의 재개정해서 평촌아파트형공장매매 의도는 더 13:00~19:00 포르코로쏘 인덕원공장사무실매매 ｜ 뛰쳐 지금 제주특별자치도 안양공장사무실매매 뒤따라 매매 백반집에서 홍대입구역 안양오비즈타워대형사무실 어렵다고 중구수학과외, 급한대로 초등미술 안양중소형사무실매매 위 Search 있을까? gt;gt;gt; 인덕원중소형사무실 부분에서 주얼리 낙후되어 쓰이는군요 평촌오비즈타워 먼저 떡볶

thread.title: News outlet: Lebanon's outgoing PM leaves Saudi to visit UAE
thread.title_full: News outlet: Lebanon's outgoing PM leaves Saudi to visit UAE

posts.title: News outlet: Lebanon's outgoing PM leaves Saudi to visit UAE
posts.text:
BEIRUT (AP) — In a new twist in the saga of Lebanon's prime minister who resigned over the weekend from Saudi Arabia, Saad Hariri's office said he visited the United Arab Emirates briefly on Tuesday for a meeting with a top official before returning to the kingdom. Much is unknown about Hariri's unexpected resignation, which stunned the Lebanese, threw its government into disarray and prompted a frenzy of speculation.
One of the rumors is that Hariri has been under house arrest in Saudi Arabia, or in some way forced to do the Saudis' bidding. His brief visit to the UAE could appear to dispel that, except that the Gulf federation is a close Saudi ally — the two countries have been spearheading a war in Yemen since 2015 against the country's Shiite rebels who are backed by Iran.
Abu Dhabi's powerful Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nayhan met Hariri and tweeted a photo, saying they discussed "brotherly ties" and the situation in Lebanon, without elaborating. Hariri's office also said the two discussed the situation in Lebanon.
Meanwhile, Saudi Arabia on Tuesday sent its harshest threat to the Lebanese government, dominated by the Shiite militant group Hezbollah, accusing it of declaring war against the kingdom through support that Hezbollah allegedly provides to Yemen's rebels.
Saudi Minister for Gulf Affairs Thamer al-Sabhan said the situation was "very sensitive and worrying" and that the Saudi patience over Hezbollah was running thin.
"The Party of Satan has become a tool of killing and terrorism for the kingdom," he told the Saudi-owned Al-Arabiya TV, a play on Hezbollah's name, which in Arabic means the Party of God.
Both Hezbollah and the Houthis, as Yemen's Shiite rebels are known, have denied any role by the Lebanese group in the war in the Arabian Peninsula country.
"The Party of Satan is represented in the Lebanese government and the government should be aware of such dangers," Sabhan said. "The Lebanese government will be dealt with as a government that has declared war against the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia."
Sabhan added that the Lebanese people should be aware of the dangers "before we reach a point of no return."
In Lebanon, President Michel Aoun held consultations Tuesday with leading politicians over the crisis. Aoun has not called for consultations with parliamentary blocs on the formation of a new Cabinet, saying he will wait until Hariri returns home so that he can hear from him in person about the reasons that made him resign.
Credit ratings agency Moody's warned that Hariri's resignation threatens to disrupt "the fragile political balance in place." It added that a drawn-out political stalemate less than a month after the government passed its first budget since 2005 "would undermine recent institutional improvements and expose the banking system to a loss in confidence."
Lebanon's banking sector is the backbone of Lebanon's economy, with assets at $213.4 billion at end-September, according to Byblos Bank, one of the country's largest lenders.
Moody's said any loss of confidence in the banking system or in the stability of Lebanon's institutions, leading to a significant slowdown in private sector deposit inflows or outright outflows, would be credit negative.
___
Associated Press writer Jon Gambrell in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, contributed to this report.

posts.title: Bättre vindar för Arise
posts.text:
Publicerad: 07 november 2017, 10:36 
Arise hade en elproduktion om 69,8 GWh under oktober månad, jämfört med månadens budget om 57,7 GWh, tack vare bättre vindar än normalt under månaden. 
Månadens produktion fördelade sig på 40,8 GWh egen produktion och 29,0 GWh samägd produktion, jämfört med månadens budget om 32,6 GWh respektive 25,1 GWh. 
Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande. Direkt-SE

thread.title_full: Armour to Barber Continues Success with new Official Brand Partner

posts.author: charlottegw
posts.title: Armour to Barber Continues Success with new Official Brand Partner
posts.text:
Armour to Barber Continues Success with new Official Brand Partner by charlottegw / November 7, 2017 
Continuing their mission to introduce ex-military personnel to the barbering industry, the Armour to Barber movement has now partnered with scissor specialist Mattaki. 
Designed to help ex-servicemen and women find careers as barbers, the movement provides those in need with vital work experience in approved barber shops in the UK. 
In support, Matakki has pledged that it will provide Armour to Barber prospects with refurbished scissors from its ‘trade in’ scheme, while also offering discounts on scissors to Armour to Barber customers. 
Founder of Armour to Barber, and former Coldstream Guard, Liam Hamilton knows the importance of great kit. “As a part of this mission, an abundance of professional tools and products are required,” he explains. 
On the new partnership, Liam said: “It’s fantastic to see industry-leading brands provide their support. At Armour to Barber, we believe that ex-forces personnel have all the attributes to take the trade by storm, and it’s pleasing to see that Matakki agree.” 
Matakki Founder James Curd added “As an ex-service man this is a cause that I can whole heartedly support and believe in. As the youngest serving engineer in the Gulf war I can relate to the adjustment from military to civilian life and have many ex-comrades who found this experience a difficult transition for a variety of reasons, often feeling lost and without direction.” 
James continues: “At Matakki we believe in providing opportunity and acknowledging ambition. I personally believe the mental strength to succeed exhibited by ex-force individuals is a commendable attribute. I look forward to being part of this movement and seeing the many opportunities it provides to those working under it.” RELATED STORIES

thread.title: PM pressed on with social care changes despite adviser warning, book claims
thread.title_full: PM pressed on with social care changes despite adviser warning, book claims

posts.author: PA
posts.title: PM pressed on with social care changes despite adviser warning, book claims
posts.text:
PM pressed on with social care changes despite adviser warning, book claims By PA 7 Nov 2017, 9:46 - 
The bitter fallout from the Conservative General Election humiliation has continued with fresh revelations about splits at the top of Theresa May's campaign. 
A new book about the ill-fated campaign claims concerns were raised about controversial social care changes in the Tory manifesto but the Prime Minister chose to press on. 
The backlash over the policy, dubbed the "dementia tax" by critics, prompted a swift U-turn by Mrs May and triggered a collapse in her poll ratings at a crucial stage of the campaign. 
The Prime Minister lost her Commons majority in the June contest, with her two closest advisers - joint chiefs of staff Nick Timothy and Fiona Hill - quitting amid criticism of their influence. 
The new book, Betting The House: The Inside Story Of The 2017 Election, by journalists Tim Ross and Tom McTague, indicates that Ms Hill had raised concerns about the social care policy. So, there's a book out today. Apparently it's quite good. Go on, buy it, you know you want to... pic.twitter.com/x2jSQD5ICu 
-- Tom McTague (@TomMcTague) November 7, 2017 
It also sets out how Mr Timothy and his allies blame political guru Sir Lynton Crosby, his business partner Mark Textor and US strategist Jim Messina for the campaign's shortcomings. 
But others pointed the finger at the manifesto drawn up by Mr Timothy, which included the controversial plan to scrap a cap on the amount people would have to pay for social care, with costs recovered from the estate after death potentially leading to people's family homes being sold rather than passed on to their children. 
The book claims Ms Hill raised objections about the reforms and tried to get them watered down hours before the manifesto went to print, but Mr Timothy resisted. 
Mrs May made the final call, saying "I want to go with it", the book said. 
A private email from Mr Timothy to Mr Textor in April showed him setting out "some of the slightly more controversial" policies under consideration for testing in focus groups, including an early version of the social care shake-up and plans to means-test winter fuel payments. Nick Timothy drew up the Conservatives' election manifesto (Dominic Lipinski/PA) 
Mr Timothy told the book's authors: "Lynton and everybody knew all the controversial content in advance, they tested everything. He saw the final draft in printed format. 
"That version, he would have seen only several days before it was published because that version only existed several days before it was printed. Social care was tested. Winter fuel payments was tested. Free school meals was tested. It was all tested. 
"The answer that came back from Tex (Mr Textor) was 'there's a risk in this but it's a manageable risk'. Clearly we didn't manage the risk very well on the social care stuff. But that's how it worked." 
An ally of Sir Lynton said details were lacking from the policies because Mrs May's team wanted to have flexibility in implementing their reforms after the expected election victory. Nick Timothy blamed Sir Lynton Crosby, pictured, his business partner Mark Textor and US strategist Jim Messina for the campaign's shortcomings, the book claims (Stefan Rousseau/PA) 
The source said: "It is true that some of the ideas in the manifesto were tested, but they weren't the policy detail. It was like: 'We should reform social care so the burden doesn't fall on younger people and we have a more sustainable programme for the future'. Well, fine, 70% will support that. 
"They did put some of this stuff to the test in quantitative and qualitative research, but the problem was they wouldn't be specific. 
"For example, the means-testing of the winter fuel allowance. Lots of MPs were saying: 'Why can't we just spell out that anyone on the basic state pension will still get it?' 
"The answer was because most people were going to lose their winter fuel allowance. They had actually costed it all so it would only be the very poorest of the poor who would get some of these things. 
"The lack of detail made people nervous and they were right to be nervous because the lack of specifics was quite deliberate - they wanted the flexibility." 
Mr Timothy said: "The point of a manifesto is to have a mandate to govern the country. It's not just about winning." Let us send you our Newsletter Our editors will email you a roundup of their favourite stories from across AOL Sign up using your AOL email or

posts.text:
Hallo!
Wie Jannis schon schrieb, gibt es epileptische Anfдlle, die man als solche nicht vermuten wьrde. Du hast vermutlich den klassischen Grand Mal vor Augen, wo die Patienten rhythmisch zucken. Das ist aber nur eine Erscheinungsform der Epilepsie von vielen.
Auch kann das EEG auяerhalb eines Anfalls vцllig in Ordnung sein. Deswegen macht man das Schlafentzugs-EEG. Man versucht damit einen Anfall zu provozieren durch die Stresssituation des Schlafmangels. Auch das Schlafentzugs- EEG kann jedoch in Ordnung sein und sich dadurch kein Anfall provozieren lassen. Es gibt Menschen, die haben ein grauenvolles EEG , aber nie einen Anfall und es gibt Menschen, die haben ein vцllig unauffдlliges EEG , aber 3 Anfдlle pro Woche.
Ein einzelnes, unauffдlliges EEG bringt also keine Gewissheit. Oft passt aber die Anfallsbeschreibung zum EEG und umgekehrt.
Ein in Epilepsie erfahrener Neuropдdiater, erkennt eine Epilepsie an der Klinik, also an den Symptomen deiner Beschreibung. Deswegen wдre es wichtig, dass du dir die Einzelheiten, wann es war, was genau war, am besten aufschreibst.
Zur Diagnostik gehцrt dann eigentlich auch ein MRT , einfach um zu schauen, dass kein anderer Prozess im Gehirn die Anfдlle auslцst.
Eine unbehandelte Epilepsie kann ьbrigens auch autistische Zьge verursachen. Das Kind wirkt, als wдre es wie weggetreten, nimmt keinen Blickkontakt auf, reagiert nicht oder verzцgert auf Ansprache etc. Das alles kann ein epileptisches Geschehen sein.
Bei meiner Tochter war das so und hat sich durch die medikamentцse Einstellung der Epilepsie deutlich gebessert. Sie hatte nur nachts im Schlaf Anfдlle, wodurch sie nie richtig im Tiefschlaf war und somit auch nicht im Schlaf verarbeiten konnte. Leider blieben die Anfдlle lange unbemerkt (weil sie eben auch nicht auffдllig ruckte und zuckte).
Von Schwimmbadbesuchen wьrde ich dir momentan auch absolut abraten, vor allem allein mit zwei Kindern. Wenn, dann muss ihn einer konstant im Auge haben, ununterbrochen.
Du schriebst, dass er krank war und Fieber hatte. Es gibt Anfдlle, die im Zusammenhang mit steigender oder sinkender Temperatur stehen. Das wдren dann sog. Fieberkrдmpfe.
Gruя
Alex

thread.title: #WikiFiction #279 Dénuée de Sens
thread.title_full: #WikiFiction #279 Dénuée de Sens

posts.author: Anna Rozen (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: #WikiFiction #279 Dénuée de Sens
posts.text:
Cette expression, que j'ai lue hier sur une plaque de pierre apposée sur la façade du lycée Paul Bert : " victimes innocentes de la barbarie nazie" est-elle dénuée de sens ? 
La phrase complète est (merci le Net) : « A la mémoire des élèves de cette école, déportés de 1942 à 1944 parce-que nés juifs, victimes innocentes de la barbarie nazie avec la complicité du gouvernement de Vichy. » (Et bravo d'avoir ajouté la non négligeable complicité) 
A quoi sert de préciser "innocentes" après le mot victimes ? Je me le suis demandé, je me le demande toujours. Certes, chacun de nous rêve que l'enfance soit innocente, du coup chaque occasion est bonne pour rappeler la notion. 
Est-ce un effet spectacle : des victimes innocentes, c'est encore plus atroce que des victimes tout court. Quid des victimes pas innocentes ou des victimes coupables ? 
Un peu plus loin dans ma balade j'ai lu sur une autre plaque de pierre sur le mur de l'Alliance Française "évolution des espèces organisées" ça faisait très département de la Fac de Sciences. D'accord avec vous, il ne faudrait pas que je me mette à considérer comme dénuées de sens, toutes les expressions que je ne comprends pas ou qui me paraissent obscures. Avec ma paranoïa naturelle, j'ai souvent tendance à penser que les phrases qui me troublent ainsi cachent quelque chose de pas net. Une intention malveillante, comme un surplus de précaution, comme quand on commence une phrase par « sincèrement ... » je me méfie. 
Mais comme je n'ai pas beaucoup d'endurance (c'est fou ce que je n'aime pas me donner du mal, faire des efforts, ou des recherches, travailler en un mot) j'arrête assez vite mon investigation pour passer à autre chose. Et comme les expressions apparemment dénuées de sens ou dont le sens est, délibérément ou non, flou, ne manquent pas, je peux discrètement sauter de l'une à l'autre après les avoir seulement effleurées, portées à votre vigilance, comme sur les pierres qui affleurent au courant d'une fraîche rivière. 
J'ai le temps pour une autre ? Ah, une mignonne, en Anglais, c'est une guide qui fait visiter la ville à un groupe de touristes, elle leur parle de je ne sais quelle célébrité historique "At the end of his life, he, huh, shot himself" ... et je me suis dit en ricanant : heureusement qu'il a choisi la fin de sa vie pour se tirer une balle, en plein milieu c'eût été vraiment trop dommage !

posts.title: Nina Radulović se oprobala i kao pjevačica, a nastupila je polugola!
posts.text:
Nina Radulović se oprobala i kao pjevačica, a nastupila je polugola! Objavljeno: 7.11.2017. 
Voditeljka Nina Radulović pre nego što je ustalila karijeru kao TV lice, pokušala je da se ostvari kao pevačica. 
Ona je pre sedam godina nastpila na Sunčanim skalama, vrlo oskudno odevena, sa pesmom “Krug”. FOTO: PRINTSCREEN 

Nina nije zabeležila neki uspeh, ali je ostala sigurno upamćena po kostimu koji je više otkrivao nego što je skrivao. 
Tada još nije bila gospođa Lečić, a zanimljivo je da je Nina kasnije snimila i pesmu zanimljivog naslova “Krevet za troje”.

posts.title: Balcão de empregos tem 20 vagas disponíveis em Petrópolis
posts.text: Site da prefeitura é a ferramenta para os candidatos cadastrarem seus currículos              O Balcão de Empregos da Prefeitura, administrado pelo – Departamento de Trabalho e Renda (Detra), da Secretaria de Desenvolvimento Econômico, tem 20 vagas disponíveis nessa semana. Os candidatos devem cadastrar os seus currículos na prefeitura pelo site www.petropolis.rj.gov.br . Mais informações podem ser consultadas no telefone (24) 2233-8113.             Das 20 vagas, três são para portadores de necessidades especiais. Dessas, duas são para ajudante de armazém, para ambos os sexos. Pede-se ensino médio completo ou em curso e laudo médico atualizado. A outra vaga é para técnico em enfermagem, para ambos os sexos. Neste caso é necessário ter ensino médio completo com técnico em enfermagem e registro atualizado, além de laudo.             Vale destacar que o balcão de empregos realiza a divulgação das vagas e os encaminhamentos dos candidatos para processo seletivo, sendo assim, fica a cargo do empregador a responsabilidade pelas entrevistas e possíveis contratações. O Detra fica na Avenida Barão do Rio Branco, nº 2846.   Ajudante de cozinha - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Mínimo 3 anos de experiência Auxiliar de serviços gerais - 2 vagas - Ensino fundamental e experiência Copeiro - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Mínimo 3 anos de experiência Cozinheiro - 3 vagas - ambos os sexos - Mínimo 3 anos de experiência Cumim (Jovem Aprendiz) - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Ensino médio completo Farmacêutico - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Ensino superior e registro de classe atualizado Frentista - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Ensino fundamental completo Garçom - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Mínimo 3 anos de experiência Operador de empilhadeira - 1 vaga - sexo masculino - Ensino fundamental completo e certificado em curso específico Pedreiro - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Ensino fundamental completo e experiência Representante comercial - 2 vagas - Ensino médio completo, veículo próprio, disponibilidade para viajar e experiência em representação de produtos da construção civil Técnico de Segurança do Trabalho - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Ensino médio e experiência na construção civil Vendedor Externo - 1 vaga - ambos os sexos - Experiência na função

Home View All Jobs ( 2,176,752 ) Caliber Home Loans Closer/Funder - Itasca, IL - Itasca, IL in Itasca , Illinois 
Caliber Home Loans, Inc. is a full-service national mortgage lender and agency direct seller/servicer. Caliber originates loans through various channels and transaction types, including a network of retail branches, wholesale lending, correspondent and emerging banker lending, and a consumer-direct centralized operation specializing in a variety of loan programs for purchase and refinance such as conforming, jumbo, and government products. Caliber also offers innovative servicing solutions for both conforming and non-conforming loans. Caliber is led by a veteran senior management team that consists of mortgage banking professionals with a history of building successful national mortgage operations. Caliber is owned by Lone Star Funds, a global private equity fund. 
POSITION SUMMARY The Closer/Funder is responsible for preparing loan packages for the closing and funding process. 
RESPONSIBILITIES * Reviews loan package for required documentation * Ensures loan package meets compliance guidelines and fixing discrepancies as necessary * Inputs and confirms data required to generate closing documents * Generates, reviews, and approves the Closing Package & HUD1 Settlement Statement * Serves as liaison between Caliber and closing agent * Calculates funding amount for each loan package, balances figures with closing agent, releases wire and funds loan * Completes work within established closing deadlines * This position is considered a non-loan originator position, this means participants may not engage in activities of a loan originator, including: communicating directly with borrowers about credit qualification or loan terms, including pricing concessions or other transaction-specific terms or conditions 
REQUIREMENTS (EDUCATION, SKILLS, & KNOWLEDGE) * High school diploma or equivalent required; 4-year college degree preferred * 1-2 years of mortgage-related experience * 1-2 years loan funding experience preferred * Basic knowledge of loan documentation * Advanced computer sills including Excel and Outlook * Advanced mathematical skills * Excellent interpersonal, written and oral communication skills * Familiar with reading and interpreting insurance policies, tax information, prelims, appraisals and settlement statements * Knowledge of MDIA and RESPA disclosure requirements * Strong attention to detail and organization skills * Ability to work in a fast-paced environment 
Caliber Home Loans, Inc. is focused on being the best mortgage company in the United States and winning through talent. Caliber is committed to diversity and is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. Visit us at www.CaliberHomeLoans.com to learn more.

thread.section_title: Pregnancy - BabyCentre
thread.title: The PTA - BabyCentre
thread.title_full: The PTA - BabyCentre

posts.author: sezza82
posts.text:
I've gone to occasional meetings if I've made it back from work in time but I'm v much on the periphery.
In my experience there is a certain type of parent that form the hardcore of the PTA and they are happy to be vocal, which is no bad thing. Sometimes maybe a bit too opinionated, but again, you need those people to bounce off each other and make things happen.
The PTA have raised a huge amount of extra funding for the school and it goes towards what I think is a great mix of kit/activities - they subsidise school trips to ensure all can attend (we're not in a wealthy area) and they buy sports and playground equipment and sports kit for the school teams. Books for the library, ICT equipment, etc. A large chunk of the money raised goes to those in the part of the school that supports kids with more specialist needs (ours is the only school in the area to offer this). Basically they spend on stuff that encourages inclusivity and that's ace in my eyes.

thread.title: Serafina, il cane di 12 anni abbandonato in discarica
thread.title_full: Serafina, il cane di 12 anni abbandonato in discarica

posts.title: Serafina, il cane di 12 anni abbandonato in discarica
posts.text:
0 CONDIVISIONI 
Gettata in discarica proprio come fosse un oggetto vecchio di cui liberarsi. La tristissima vicenda risale a pochi giorni fa ed è avvenuta a Monreale , in provincia di Palermo: il “rifiuto” abbandonato in discarica in realtà è una beagle con tanto di collare che i volontari hanno chiamato Serafina . 
Nessuno va a riprenderla perché è stata volontariamente abbandonata forse perché diventata un peso con i suoi 12 anni. Lei però aspetta con tenacia che chi l’ha abbandonata possa tornare a riprenderla: non si muove e ha sguardo spaesato, non cerca di allontanarsi e attende con pazienza i suoi padroni. Non sa neppure procurarsi del cibo anche perché è adulta, soffre il freddo, ma nonostante ciò non si muove. 
I volontari che l’hanno trovata spiegano di non potersene occupare perché non hanno posto per lei, ma Serafina non può rimanere in discarica. L’appello dei volontari, lanciato attraverso quotidiano.net che ha pubblicato le foto, è partito immediatamente per cercare di sensibilizzare chi possa occuparsi di Serafina: vorrebbero creare un gruppo di genitori adottivi a distanza c he possa finanziare il ricovero in una pensione o valutare, ancora meglio, una famiglia che possa accoglierla temporaneamente mentre si cerca la famiglia giusta che possa adottarla. 
Per poter aiutare Serafina, i volontari hanno messo a disposizione i contatti di 
ANNA 320 840 6998 [email protected] e CINZIA 333 2 999 555 [email protected] . 
LAV, GLI ULTIMI DATI SUL RANDAGISMO 
E se il numero dei randagi in Sicilia è sceso da 250 a 196, la situazione resta tragica. Solo 70, stando ai dati diffusi dal Giornale di Sicilia, sono il frutto di abbandoni di cuccioli che si sono registrati nel corso degli ultimi due anni e circa 50 sono stati accalappiati in seguito ad aggressioni.

thread.title: 반포치과 소아교정 시작 시기는 언제?
thread.title_full: 반포치과 소아교정 시작 시기는 언제? : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: MCG치과
posts.title: 반포치과 소아교정 시작 시기는 언제?
posts.text:
​ 아이의 성장, 부모님들에게는 큰 관심사 중 하나죠~
많은 분들이 단순히 키와 몸무게를 생각하게 되지만
이는, 다양한 기관이 조화를 이루며 올바르게
성장하는 것이 보다 중요하다고 조언드립니다.
특히, 치아의 경우 아이의 외모에도
큰 영향을 미칠 수 있어 보다 까다롭게 살펴보시는 것이 중요합니다.
만일 우리 아이에게서 덧니나 뻐드렁니
치아가 가지런하지 못한 상황이 나타나게 된다면? 반포치과, 어떠한 과정으로 치료를 진행하는지
이에 대하여 안내해드리는 시간 가져보도록 하겠습니다. 교정진료, 아무래도 성인이나 청소년기 때
시작하는 것이 좋다고 생각하는 경우가 있습니다.
그렇지만 반포치과에서는 소아교정의 경우
자라면서 나타날 수 있는 골격적 부조화 예방에 도움이 되며
아이들의 얼굴 골격을 비롯한
올바른 치열이 자리잡는 것에 큰 도움이 된다고 안내해드립니다.
특히, 손가락을 자주 빠는 습관 이 있는 아이들이나
혀를 내미는 습관을 가진 상황이라면
치열의 문제로 이어질 수 있어
초기 소아교정을 진행하는 것이 좋습니다. 그렇다면, 어떠한 과정으로 치료가 이루어지게 될까요? 반포치과, 소아교정을 진행하는 경우
다음과 같은 부분에 큰 도움이 된다고 안내해드립니다. 교정을 진행하는 경우 치아공간의 확보에 유리에
덧니나 뻐드렁니 등의 증상 예방에 도움이 되며
자라나면서 발생할 수 있는 부정교합 예방에
보다 도움이 된다고 조언드립니다. 교정 시 나타날 수 있 는 치아의 뿌리가
녹는 현상이 적게 나타나며
성장하면서 발생할 수 잇는 골격적 부적합을
초기에 교정할 수 있도록 유도합니다. 마지막으로, 교정 시 성인보다
구강조직의 반응이 높아 재발이 적으며 교정이 용이합니다. ​
​
반포치과에서는, 소아교정 다음과 같은
증상이 발생하는 때 권해드리고 있습니다. 우선, 유치가 일직 빠지거나 늦게까지 남아있는 경우나
덧니, 뻐드렁니와 같이 비뚤어지거나 튀어나온 치아가
발생하는 상황,돌출된 치아가 나타나거나 윗니나
아랫니가 맞닿지 못하거나 과하게 맞물린다면
교정을 통하여 개선하는 것이 좋습니다. 이러한 상황 외에는 입으로 숨을 쉬거나
악골이 후퇴된 경우, 이를 가는 습관이나
이를 악무는 경우라면 소아교정을
진행하는 것이 도움이 됩니다.
​
MCG 치과의원, 반포치과에서는
소아교정을 진행하는 경우 3D CT / X-ray와 같은
정밀한 검사를 진행하여 아이의 치아건강을 확인하게 되며
이러한 검사결과를 바탕으로 진료절차에 대해 안내해드립니다. 이를 통하여 치료 계획을 수립하게 되며
처음부터 끝까지 서울대 최연소 교수님께서
직접 초진과 진료를 시행하기 때문에
보다 편안하게 치료를 받아보실 수 있습니다. 교정을 진행할 시 잇몸의 퇴축, 염증, 통증등의
부작용이 나타날 수 있어 치료 이전 주의하셔야하며
의료진의 지시를 잘 따라주셔야 합니다. 이렇게, 반포치과 어떠한 치료과정으로
도움을 드리고 있는지 안내해드렸습니다. 치료에 대해 문의사항이나 궁금하신 점이 있으시다면
하단 이미지를 확인하셔서 진료안내를
알아보시는 것을 권해드리고 있습니다.

thread.title: Kalp hastalarının yeni 'umudu'
thread.title_full: Kalp hastalarının yeni 'umudu'

posts.title: Kalp hastalarının yeni 'umudu'
posts.text:
Yorum Yap Yazdır Facebook 'ta Paylaş Kalp hastalarının yeni 'umudu' Recep Tayyip Erdoğan Üniversitesi(RTEÜ) Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi Kardiyoloji kliniğinde ilki gerçekleşen mitral kalp kapağının kapalı tamir yöntemi ile ilk hastada başarıyla uygulandı. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 12:39 
Aort kalp kapağının kapalı yöntemle tedavisi, eski kapağın değişimi TAVİ 3 boyutlu kalp ultrosonu ile tanı ve görüntüleme yöntemi, kalp yetmezliğinde kalp pili ile güncel tedavisi, kalp ritim bozukluklarında 3 boyutlu görüntüleme, eps ve tedavi yöntemleri başarıyla uygulanmakta olup, bu yeni yöntem RTEÜ Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi’nde ilk defa başarıyla uygulandı. 
Özellikle açık kalp ameliyatı olamayan, ileri kalp kapak hastalığı (ileri mitral yetmezliği), ileri kalp yetmezliği olan ve ilaç tedavisi dışında alternatifi olmayan ölümcül hastalıklarda, kapalı yöntemle mitral kapak tamir (anjiyografik olarak, mitral kapağın anuler daraltma, (carillon mitral kapak anuler daraltma) ile mitral kapak yetmezliğin azaltılması tedavisinin merkezimdeki ilk vakası başarıyla yapıldı. 
RTEÜ Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi Başhekimi Prof. Dr. Hasan Türüt, yaptığı açıklamada, hastanelerinin artık sevk veren bir konumdan sevk alan bir seviyeye gelmeye başladığını söyledi. Yapılan operasyonun Türkiye'de çok az merkezde yapılabildiğini belirten Türüt, “Recep Tayyip Erdoğan Üniversitesi Eğitim Araştırma Hastanesi taşıdığı isme layık olmayı birincil hedefine koyan, hastayı ve hastanın sağlığını önceleyen ve bu hedef doğrultusunda fedakarane ve mesai mefhumu gözetmeden çalışan felsefesiyle mevcut eksikliklerini bir an önce gidererek gerçek anlamda bir bölgesel referans merkezi olmayı amaçlamaktadır.”dedi. 
Ameliyatı gerçekleştiren Kardiyoloji Anabilim Dalı Başkanı Doç.Dr. Ömer Şatıroğlu ise ileri derece kalp kapakçıklarında kaçak bulunan, kalp yetmezliği bulunan, ameliyat şansı bulunmayan çok yüksek riskli hastalara bu yöntemin uygulandığını belirterek, şunları kaydetti: 
"Hastamız yaşlı olduğu için açık kalp ameliyatı olma imkanı yoktu. Yeni yöntem olan mitral kapağı kapalı yöntemle kalp kapağındaki kaçağı azaltma yöntemini hastaya uyguladık ve işlem başarılı geçti. Rize'de bunu ilk uygulamanın sevinci yaşıyoruz. Yurt dışında yaklaşık iki yıldan beri uygulanan bu yeni yöntemin ülkemizde de bir kaç kardiyoloji hastanesi var. Bu yöntemi de bizde Recep Tayyip Erdoğan Üniversitesi Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi'ne uygulayarak, ilklerden biri olduk." 
Ameliyat olan 85 yaşındaki Fatma Kıdal, yeniden hayata döndüğü için çok mutlu olduğunu ve kendisini tedavi eden doktorlara teşekkür ederek, "Allah onları başımızdan eksik etmesin" diye belirtti. 
Oğlu Hüseyin Kıdal da, "Annemi göğüs ağrısı ve nefes darlığı şikayeti ile hastane getirdiğimizde doktorlar bize açık kalp ameliyatı yapamayacaklarını, ancak kapalı yöntemle tedavi edebileceklerini ve bunu ilk kez yapacaklarını söyledi. Annem iki gün önce ameliyat oldu ve şuan da hiç bir sıkıntısı yok. Dilerim ki bu tür hastalarımız artık il dışına, büyük illere gidip sıkıntı çekmeden kendi memleketlerinde tedavi olma imkanı bulur." diye konuştu. İlgili Galeriler

thread.title_full: 化学の歴史の中で原子が多様な結合をしたり物質の正体が何であるの... - Yahoo!知恵袋

posts.author: scarlet_sister495
posts.text:
何が役立つか、どういったことに有用か。そんなもの一切考えてません。ものを極限まで小さく分割したらどうなっているか考えた人がたくさんおり、様々な説ができました。「お前の理論は間違ってる、俺が正しい」と我の強い理論屋さんがおり、「じゃあ俺が証明してやる」という実験屋さんがいただけです。実験したところどうやら今の原子説が正しいといことがわかったということです。
イオンに関しても、「水中で電気を運ぶ物質(イオン)が絶対にあるはずだ」という説を実験により証明したに過ぎません。

thread.title: Hace seña obscena a Trump y la corren del trabajo
thread.title_full: Hace seña obscena a Trump y la corren del trabajo

posts.author: La Prensa de Monclova
posts.title: Hace seña obscena a Trump y la corren del trabajo
posts.text:
E) Internacional Hace seña obscena a Trump y la corren del trabajo Hace seña obscena a Trump y la corren del trabajo Nov 7, 2017 9 views 0 Una mujer estadunidense fue despedida de su puesto como ejecutiva de marketing por hacer una seña obscena al presidente Donald Trump. 
Juli Briskman, de 50 años, perdió su empleo en la empresa Akima luego de ser captada por un fotógrafo de prensa realizando el gesto del dedo medio levantado al paso de la caravana que trasladaba al mandatario estadunidense a su campo de golf en Virginia el mes pasado, reporta The Washington Post . 
Aunque Briskman se encontraba fuera de servicio, no vestía ninguna ropa que delatara a la compañía para la que trabajaba y tampoco aparecía su rostro en la imagen, sus jefes decidieron prescindir de sus servicios a causa del incidente. 
La mujer aseguró que aquel día, al ver pasar la comitiva de Trump, sintió rabia de que el presidente de su país se fuera a jugar golf en medio de la emergencia que entonces sufría Puerto Rico a causa del huracán ‘María’, la posible deportación de miles de jóvenes inmigrantes y la matanza en Las Vegas. 
Estaba pensando en todo esto cuando vi venir los autos negros y recordé, oh, claro, él va de regreso al campo de golf”, contó Briskman al Post. 
La mujer no contaba con que un fotógrafo de la agencia de noticias AFP captaría el momento exacto de la demostración de su furia. 
Pero unos amigos vieron la imagen y la cuestionaron al respecto. 
Les dije: Sí, soy yo, ¿no es gracioso?”, comentó. 
Entonces Briskman decidió retomar la fotografía en sus perfiles de redes sociales, provocando una oleada de reacciones que incluyeron amenazas de muerte. 
Cuando sus jefes en Akima, un contratista del gobierno federal, se enteraron del suceso, quedaron atónitos. 
Aunque ni siquiera estaba trabajando cuando todo ocurrió, (los jefes) me dijeron que había violado el código de conducta de la compañía”, explicó. 
Briskman, madre de dos adolescentes, fue despedida el día de Halloween. 
Lo volvería hacer”, aseguró.

thread.title_full: Ruhestand nach 42 Dienstjahren

posts.author: no-reply@meinbezirk.at (Alexandra Goll)
posts.title: Ruhestand nach 42 Dienstjahren
posts.text:
07.11.2017, 10:30 Uhr Ruhestand nach 42 Dienstjahren PSI Josef Fürst, Robert Löscher mit Gattin Christine, Dir. Willi Ostap, Christian Schwayer, Bgm. Markus Baier und Ernst Muck. Foto: Josef Messirek 
Fest für Robert Löscher, der in den Ruhestand verabschiedet wurde. ZELLERNDORF (jm). Direktor Willi Ostap konnte zur Schulfeier anlässlich der Verabschiedung von Schulrat Robert Löscher in den Ruhestand PSI Josef Fürst , Bgm. Markus Baier und Schulobmann Ernst Muck , Altbgm. Hermann Jagenteufel , Prälat Franz Mantler , Kaplan Eduard Schretter , EV-Obmann Christian Schwayer sowie die SchülerInnen und LehrerInnen der VS und NMS begrüßen. In seiner Laudatio führte Ostap die zahlreichen Funktionen an, die Löscher in seinen 42 Dienstjahren innehatte: Er war Leiter von Schikursen, Schwimm- und Wienwochen, baute das Fach „Berufsorientierung“ und den Top-Talente-Check auf und war engagiert bei allen Schulveranstaltungen, insbesondere bei der Organisation der Schulbälle. Sein Ausscheiden aus dem Lehrkörper wird eine Lücke hinterlassen. Bgm. Markus Baier : „Mit Wehmut und Dank verabschieden wir dich heute in den Ruhestand.“ Der Ortschef war noch vor 13 Jahren sein Schüler und wusste Löschers pädagogischen Einsatz besonders zu schätzen. Der Schulratstitel war dem einsatzfreudigen Pädagogen schon vor zwei Jahren verliehen worden, „als Auszeichnung für Leistungen, die über den Stundenplan hinausgehen“, wie PSI Josef Fürst ausführte. Löscher ist auch im außerschulischen Bereich sehr aktiv. In seiner Heimatstadt Retz ist er Ehrenobmann der Stadtkapelle und noch immer als Trompeter aktiv. Er konnte auch zahlreiche Jugendliche für den Eishockeysport begeistern, was zur Gründung der „Retzer Ice Lions“ führte. Gefällt mir

posts.text:
BPL 2017 : Sylhet Sixers v Khulna Titans T20 Match Fantasy Team Prediction 

For Any kind of information.. join our  WhatsApp Group  Click here 
Download our No Advertisement free Application  Click here 

Overview  

Sylhet Sixers will take on Rajshahi Kings in the 6th match of the BPL T20 tomorrow in Sylhet. Weather wise, another fine day awaits us. The pitch has been a touch two-paced but it has essentially favoured the batsmen.

The hosts have already won two games in two outings, owing to which any change to their playing 11 will be a big surprise. Also, their overseas players, especially the openers- Tharanga and Fletcher have done well at the top.

On the bowling front too they look fairly settled. On the other hand, the Kings looked a little rattled. Perhaps, they would be keen on getting more firepower on the local front.

The Pakistani cricketers will continue to remain absent and picking them could be a waste of budget and slot.

Probable 11 


SYS-  N Hossain, Tharanga, Fletcher, N Hasan, Sabbir, Whitely/Gunathilaka, Hom, Santokie, T Islam, A Hasan, Plunkett. 
RK-  Wright/Simmons, Rony, Haque, Samit /Simmons , Sammy, Franklin, Reza, Rahim, Mehdy, Kesrick, N Islam jnr/Nihaduzzaman. 
Players to Watch 
Wright- The English opener can be very inconsistent, but can be very dangerous as well opening the innings.

M Hasan- He is cheeky and knows a trick or two to operate in this format. Very handy with bat and ball.

N Hossain- He has been operating in the powerplay with the ball, bowling his offies and has got rich dividends. 
Try to Make ur Own Team with some changes. 
Captain & Vice-captain Options : Fletcher, Whiteley, Samit, Rony, Sammy, Franklin & N Hossain.
